articles.description: Infinix 32X1 and Infinix 43X1 smart TVs have been launched in India and will be available for purchase via Flipkart. The two models come with TUV Rheinland certification for a safer viewing experience.
articles.content: Infinix 32X1 and Infinix 43X1 smart TVs have been launched in India as part of the company's Infinix X1 series. The two TV models run on Android and come with bezel-less screens. Both TV models are T… [+1918 chars]

articles.title: Cyberpunk 2077 iconic weapons: Here is a list of some of the best weapons - Republic World
articles.description: In Cyberpunk 2077, iconic weapons are special weapons found at special locations throughout the Night City and can be obtained from vendors and missions.
